text: Yakshcho vony sperechayutʹsya z vamy, todi kazhutʹ, "ya prosto pidkoryvsya sebe do BOHA; I ta tsey khto slidkuyutʹ meni." Vy budete proholosyty do tsykh khto otrymaly svyate pysannya, tak zhe, yak i tsey khto bude ne, 'Chy ne mohly b vy bude pidkorytysya?" Yakshcho vony pidkoryayutʹsya, todi vony keruvalysʹ, ale yakshcho vony prohanyayutʹ, vasha yedyna misiya musytʹ dostavyty tse povidomlennya. BOH Seer vsikh lyudey
